text: Tuhade vicom' jihare loka apani'am patani'am nala zihara (talaka dena di ika halata, jisa vica pati apani patani nu kahida hai, ki tu meri mam di pitha vanga ho ja) karade hana. Uha unham di'am manvam nahim hana. Unham di'am mavam tam uha hana jinham ne unham nu janama dita hai. Ate iha loka besaka bibekahina ate jhuthi gala kahide hana. Ate alaha mu'afa karana vala bakhasana vala hai
